service.title: cite-as: A Link Relation to Convey a Preferred URI for Referencing
service.documentation: This specification defines a link relation type that is intended to convey that a URI, other than the URI that provides a link with the relation type, is preferred for the purpose of referencing.

link-relation.documentation: A link with the "cite-as" relation type indicates that the link target is preferred over the link context for the purpose of referencing.
